tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_classroom_discussions (
	discussion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	topic TEXT,
	created_at TIMESTAMP,
	participant_name TEXT,
	message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Virtual_Classroom_Discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    speaker VARCHAR(100),
    duration_minutes INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Virtual_Classroom_Interactions (
    interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_id INT,
    participant VARCHAR(100),
    message TEXT,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (discussion_id) REFERENCES Virtual_Classroom_Discussions(discussion_id)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_classrooms (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    participants VARCHAR(255),
    start_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE discussions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    discussion_content TEXT,
    discussion_time TIMESTAMP,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES virtual_classrooms(id)
);
CREATE TABLE interactions (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_name VARCHAR(255),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_details TEXT,
    interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES virtual_classrooms(id)
);
CREATE TABLE attendees (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    attending_since TIMESTAMP,
    last_interaction_time TIMESTAMP,
    room_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (room_id) REFERENCES virtual_classrooms(id)
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_classroom_discussions (
    discussion_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    message TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE user_attendance (
    attendance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    date DATE,
    time_in TIMESTAMPTZ,
    time_out TIMESTAMPTZ
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_id UUID,
    user_id UUID,
    question VARCHAR(255),
    answer TEXT
);
